meanings.definition: A plant with dark green leaves that are commonly eaten as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat spinach with my dinner.
meanings.sent2: Spinach is a healthy vegetable that is full of nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The spinach on my plate tried to escape, but I caught it!
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a sea of spinach, waving in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green of the spinach leaves brightened up the salad.

meanings.definition: The leaves of this plant used as a food source.
meanings.sent1: My mom makes delicious salads with fresh spinach.
meanings.sent2: In the market, you can find spinach in the vegetable section.
meanings.sent3: The spinach in the fridge told the lettuce a joke, and they both laughed.
meanings.sent4: His brain felt like a tangled mess of spinach leaves after the long day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sautéed spinach filled the kitchen with a comforting smell.
